GitHub

About Me

Full-stack web developer leveraging a business background to build sites oriented towards user engagement. Earned a certificate in full-stack web development from the University of Texas at Austin’s Web Development Boot Camp with newly developed skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. Known as an innovative problem solver passionate about developing apps, with a focus on mobile-first design and user accessibility. With each project, my aim is to make a site that is easy to use and fully engages my audiences for an impactful user experience. I applied aspects of front-end development in a recent project. I worked on a team of six to develop a single-page website that helps users easily search for actor information, movies, or television shows. I’m excited to leverage my skills as part of a fast-paced, quality-driven team to build better experiences on the web.

Work

Watchopedia

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

I am a movie & tv show lover but I do not know what I want to watch. I open watchopedia and search by (actor, tv show, or movie). The website populates results of the search. I can save some of those titles to favorites.

View Project on GitHub

Weather Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

Created a weather dashboard that dynamically displays the weather outlook for multiple cities. On the left side of the page is a form where a user can input a city. When a user inputs a city, a button with that city's name will be created so that the user can easily go back to a previous city. On the right side of the page, the current weather is displayed at the top and a five day forecast is displayed at the bottom. The UV index is color coded based on the severity level.

View Project on GitHub

Taskmaster Pro

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

Created a way to add tasks to a to do list and track their status.

View Project on GitHub

Work Scheduler

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

Created a schedule for workday hours (between 9 AM and 5pm) that allows users to input a task in a time slot. Time slots in the past are listed in gray, the current time slot is listed in red, and future time slots are listed in green. This makes it easy for users to know what times they are available, as well as visualize which task deadlines are approaching and prioritize those tasks

View Project on GitHub

https://github.com/nicnolen/CodeQuiz

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

Created a short 5 question coding quiz that starts at 60 seconds and counts down. For every question you get right, you get 1 point added to your final score, and for every question you get wrong, 2 seconds are subtracted from your time.

View Project on GitHub

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

Made a web app that will search GitHub for open source projects with open issues and pull requests
